text: Albert Johnson (November 2, 1974 â€“ June 20, 2017), better known by his stage name Prodigy, was an American rapper. He was known for being the one half of the hip hop duo Mobb Deep with Havoc. He also appeared in the 2007 drama movie Blackout and Eminem biopic 8 Mile. Prodigy died of complications from sickle- cell anemia and choking on an egg at a hospital in Las Vegas, Nevada on June 20, 2017, aged 42. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1974 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from anemia Category:Deaths from choking Category:African-American rappers Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American hip hop musicians Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Prodigy (rapper)
